without this 
warngin will show 

WARNING: REMOTE HOST IDENTIFICATION HAS CHANGED! 

Here is the simplest solution:
cd ~
cd .ssh

ssh-keygen -R <host>
For example,

ssh-keygen -R 142.93.236.178
